title: Premalal Jayasekera acquitted and discharged  from Kahawatta murder case
body_lines: The Court of Appeal today ordered to acquit and discharge Ratnapura District SLPP Parliamentarian Premalal Jayasekera and two others from the Kahawatta murder case.

On July 31, 2020, Premalal Jayasekera and two others were convicted by Ratnapura High Court for committing murder of Shantha Dodamgoda while being engaged in decorating the election stage in Kahawatta area. (Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
